company_profiles = []
url = ['https://graduan.com/maxis-berhad','https://graduan.com/banknegara','https://graduan.com/intel-malaysia','https://graduan.com/dell-technologies',
       'https://graduan.com/tm','https://graduan.com/resort.world.genting.107584','https://graduan.com/petron',
       'https://graduan.com/publicbank','https://graduan.com/umw-holdings-berhad','https://graduan.com/western-digital-sandisk-storage-malaysia',
       'https://graduan.com/cimb','https://graduan.com/prudential','https://graduan.com/maybank','https://graduan.com/sony-emcs-malaysia-sdn-bhd',
       'https://graduan.com/shell-malaysia','https://graduan.com/hongleong','https://graduan.com/simedarbyproperty','https://graduan.com/malaysiaairlines',
       'https://graduan.com/affinbank','https://graduan.com/tnb','https://graduan.com/dyson233','https://graduan.com/perodua','https://graduan.com/drb.hicom.berhad.51',"https://graduan.com/tm"]
for x in url:
    company_profiles.append(scraper.get_result_similar(x))

source.645892f2:
### Outline
    1.Scraping the companies' website and no. of employees from (https://graduan.com/)
    
    2.Scraping the companies' address(HQ) and industry value(sector) from (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_companies_of_Malaysia)
    
    3.Merging,cleaning,renaming the data
source.c071897e:
# 🤔Task : Scrap the given companies' number of employees, address, website, and industry value  from the web .
### Workflow:
    1.Identify the data source(website)
    2.Inspect the identified website using developer tools
        - Know where the required information is stored in the webpage
    3.Decide the approach of scraping
        - Type of website (Static - BeautifulSoup, Dynamic - Selenium)
        - Ease of scraping (Normal Scraping, Auto-Scraping,Pandas Scraping)
    4.Scrap 
    5.Clean to keep only the required data and merge scraped data.
    6.Save in .csv file for output.
